command.title: Lógica Condicional (Case)
command.description: Uso de condicionales para transformar datos en la proyección. [KQL Base Table: Bikestream; Group By: Neighbourhood]

part.desc: Define o redefine la columna Neighbourhood en la salida.
Si Neighbourhood está vacío, usa "Unidentified"; de lo contrario, usa el valor original.

command.full: Bikestream | summarize ["Total"] = sum(No_Bikes) by Neighbourhood | project Neighbourhood = case(isempty(Neighbourhood), "Unidentified", Neighbourhood)
